attributes.action: Stop all foreign aid and use it in this country. Charity begins at home.
attributes.additional_details:
It is about time that we use our money for problems in our country and stop sending it abroad.
Many MP's are calling for our government to think about using this money for Flood victims and Sea defences and not waste it on foreign countries, many of whom do not need it.
Come on Britons support your own country.
